name: Safeguard Measures (Amendment) Ordinance, 2002
tagline: To amend the Safeguard Measures Ordinance, 2002
content:
THE SAFEGUARD  MEASURES ORDINA NCE, 2002.  
 
 
 
ORDINANCE  NO. XXXI OF 2002  
 
 
 
AN 
ORDINAN CE 
 
 
to amend the Safeguard  Measures Ordina nce, 2002 
 
 
 
 
WHEREAS  it is expedient to amend the Safeguard Measures Ordin ance, 2002 
(XXXI  of 2002),  for the purpos es hereinafter appearing; 
 
 
 
AND  WHEREAS  the National Assembly is not in session  and the President is 
satisfied that circumstances exist which render it necessary to take immediate action; 
 
 
 
NOW, THE REFORE,  in exercise  of the 'pow ers conferred  by clause (I) of 
Article 89 of the Constitution  of the Islamic Republic  of Pakistan, the President is 
pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance:- 
 
 
 
1. Short title and commencement.- (1) This Ordinance may be called the Safeguard 
Measures (Amendment) Ordin ance, 2002. 
(3) It shall come into force at once. 
2. Amendment of section 3, Ordinance XXXI of 2002: In the Safeguard Measures 
Ordin ance,  2002  coon  of  2002),  hereinafter  referred  to as  the  said  Ordin ance,  in 
section 3, the words  and comma "as a result of unforeseen developments and of the 
effect of  WTO obligations assumed by Pakistan," shall be omitted.
